rules.ruleString: Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {IAR4500, OHS1000}
Must be enrolled in course version {2126%, 2136%, F3001%}

description: This unit runs in parallel with IAR4120 to reinforce the intellectual and design contexts for the studio exploration. Activities include ongoing reflection, documentation and contextualisation of students' research.  Students will draw on IAR4500 to articulate processes, findings and implications uncovered through the studio project.
faculty: Faculty of Art, Design and Architecture
